name: Disaster Island (OstGeneralen)
description:
Disaster Island is a game where you must keep wildfires under control, all your citizens alive and managed the camp doctor all at the same time. 

This game was created in 48h for the GMTK Jam 2020 using our home built engine SpelSylt 2.0

SpelSylt 2.0 is using the following awesome third party libraries: 

  • SFML 2.6 https://www.sfml-dev.org/
  • JSON for modern C++ https://github.com/nlohmann/json
  • Box2D (not used in this game) https://box2d.org/
